attributes.action: Drive the introduction of financial education into the education curriculum
attributes.additional_details: The government must provide funding for teacher training to ensure educators are well-equipped to teach key financial skills. The government should also collaborate with financial experts, including advisors willing to donate their time for FREE. to create accessible, up-to-date resources. Finally, regular assessments should be carried out to ensure the curriculum is effective and relevant, helping students develop the necessary skills to manage their finances in adulthood.
attributes.background: The government should make financial education mandatory, ensuring all students learn key money management skills. It must invest in teacher training, provide up-to-date resources, and collaborate with experts. Regular assessments should also ensure the curriculum remains relevant and effective.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701663
